Intro.title: Full Stack Engineer
Intro.passion: with a passion for software engineering

About.background: I hold a degree in Computer Engineering and have a strong inclination towards tackling intricate problems. My experience in both hardware and software domains, gained through internships, has steered me towards a career in software engineering.
About.skills: I am proficient in various technologies including Java, Spring Boot, JavaScript, Node.js, and React, and I also possess expertise in System Design and Distributed Systems.
About.mindset: I believe in innovation and finding solutions, people always say think outside the box but for me i simply don't see the box.
About.interests: Beyond my professional pursuits, I find enjoyment in immersing myself in classical literature, psychology, and history books. Music is another passion of mine, and I take pleasure in playing the guitar.
About.career: I am actively seeking opportunities in Software Engineering, aiming to leverage my problem-solving skills and technical expertise to contribute to impactful projects and collaborate with like-minded professionals.
